lead_paragraph: Charles Howell III has removed his name from the alternate list at the British Open because of a medical procedure that will sideline him for about a month.

headline.print_headline: Charles Howell to Be Out 4-5 Weeks With Medical Procedure
headline.main: Charles Howell to Be Out 4-5 Weeks With Medical Procedure
